full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 757 Filed 08/10/22 Page 21 of 49 1994 LC9VMAXT Chapell - direct 1 A. Good morning. 2 Q. Ms. Chapell, where do you work? 3 A. Federal Express Corporation. 4 Q. How long have you worked there? 5 A. One year. 6 Q. What's your position at Federal Express? 7 A. Senior paralegal. 8 THE COURT: Mr. Rohrbach, could you pull the mic up a 9 little please. Thank you. 10 MR. ROHRBACH: Of course. I apologize, your Honor. 11 THE COURT: Thank you. 12 Q. And what are your duties and responsibilities as a senior paralegal at FedEx? 13 A. To respond to subpoenas and produce the records of Federal 14 Express. 15 Q. And as part of your job, are you familiar with Federal 16 Express's recordkeeping practices? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. In particular, are you familiar with the business practices 19 regarding billing invoices? 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. How are billing invoices generated? 22 A. They are generated through the scanning events and then 23 populated through the revenue service department. 24 Q. Can you explain what you mean by scanning events? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019145

1 A. Good morning. 2 Q. Ms. Chapell, where do you work? 3 A. Federal Express Corporation. 4 Q. How long have you worked there? 5 A. One year. 6 Q. What's your position at Federal Express? 7 A. Senior paralegal. 8 THE COURT: Mr. Rohrbach, could you pull the mic up a 9 little please. Thank you. 10 MR. ROHRBACH: Of course. I apologize, your Honor. 11 THE COURT: Thank you. 12 Q. And what are your duties and responsibilities as a senior paralegal at FedEx? 13 A. To respond to subpoenas and produce the records of Federal 14 Express. 15 Q. And as part of your job, are you familiar with Federal 16 Express's recordkeeping practices? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. In particular, are you familiar with the business practices 19 regarding billing invoices? 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. How are billing invoices generated? 22 A. They are generated through the scanning events and then 23 populated through the revenue service department. 24 Q. Can you explain what you mean by scanning events? 25
